story:
Once upon a time in a beautiful land far, far away, there lived a young dragon named Liang. Liang was a kind and brave dragon who loved exploring the forests and mountains near his home.

One day, as Liang was flying through the skies, he saw a group of lost animals in the forest below. The animals looked scared and confused, and Liang knew he had to help them. With his gentle heart and strong wings, Liang swooped down and guided the lost animals safely back to their homes.

Word of Liang's bravery and kindness spread quickly throughout the land, and soon, he became known as the "Guardian Dragon" who watched over all the creatures in the forest.

One evening, as the sun began to set and the stars twinkled in the night sky, Liang gathered all the animals around a cozy campfire. He told them stories of his adventures and shared his wisdom about the importance of helping others in need.

As the animals listened intently, they felt grateful to have Liang as their protector and friend. And as they drifted off to sleep under the watchful eye of the Guardian Dragon, they knew that they were safe and loved.

And so, every night, Liang would fly through the skies, ensuring that all the creatures in the land were safe and sound, spreading love and kindness wherever he went.

As the moon shone brightly overhead, Liang would return to his cozy cave, feeling happy and fulfilled, knowing that he had made a difference in the lives of those around him.

And so, dear son, remember to be like Liang - brave, kind, and always ready to help those in need. Goodnight, my child. Sleep tight and dream of the wonderful adventures that await you.
